text: KRFY (88.5 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Ponderay, Idaho. The station is owned by Panhandle Community Radio, Inc., and airs a variety format. The station was assigned the KRFY call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on September 29, 2009. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * RFY Category:Radio stations established in 2011 Category:2011 establishments in Idaho Category:Variety radio stations in the United States Category:Community radio stations in the United States Category:Bonner County, Idaho
title: KRFY
